name: dinode
description: Dependency Injection framework for Node.js (and JavaScript in general)
author: Jakob Mattsson <jakob.mattsson@gmail.com> (jakobmattsson.se)

scripts.coverage: npm run pretest && jscov --expand lib .cov && JSCOV=.cov mocha --compilers coffee:coffee-script/register --reporter mocha-term-cov-reporter --recursive
